title: Bug 124620 - Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
OB: The icon of the referenced parameter remains unchanged even after the source parameter in the library has been deleted.
EB: The icon of the referenced parameter should be invalid once the source parameter in the library is deleted.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a library. 2. Insert a report scalar parameter. 3. Create a report and use the created library. 4. In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of the report. 5. Open the library file and delete the parameter. 6. Reopen the report design file and observe that the icon of the parameter remains unchanged.
